00040 /**
00041  * @file
00042  *
00043  * New lockless timer API, inspired by ODP timer definition.
00044  *
00045  * <hr>$Revision: 137666 $<hr>
00046  */
00047 
00048 #ifndef __CVMX_TIM_ATOMIC_H
00049 #define __CVMX_TIM_ATOMIC_H
00050 
00051 #include "cvmx-wqe.h"
00052 
00053 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00054 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00055 extern "C" {
00056 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00057 #endif
00058 
00059 /* Timer handle is opaque to application */
00060 typedef union cvmx_timer_info_u *cvmx_timer_id_t;
00061 
00062 typedef enum {
00063     CVMX_TIMER_STATUS_SUCCESS = 0,
00064     CVMX_TIMER_STATUS_NO_MEMORY = -1,
00065     CVMX_TIMER_STATUS_TOO_FAR_AWAY = -9,
00066     CVMX_TIMER_STATUS_MISMATCH = -2,
00067     CVMX_TIMER_STATUS_BUSY = -3,
00068     CVMX_TIMER_STATUS_HANDLE = -4,
00069     CVMX_TIMER_STATUS_NOT_FOUND = -5,
00070 } cvmx_timer_status_t;
00071 
00072 /**
00073  * This is an opaque structure that is used as a handle into
00074  * a specific timeout, so it can be cancelled prior to its expiration.
00075  */
00076 typedef struct {
00077     uint64_t word[2];
00078 } cvmx_timer_handle_t;
00079 
00080 extern cvmx_timer_status_t
00081 cvmx_timer_arm_absolute(cvmx_timer_id_t timer_id, uint64_t abs_tick,
00082         cvmx_wqe_t *wqe, cvmx_timer_handle_t *handle_ptr);
00083 
00084 extern cvmx_timer_status_t
00085 cvmx_timer_arm_relative(cvmx_timer_id_t timer_id, int64_t ticks_from_now,
00086         cvmx_wqe_t *wqe, cvmx_timer_handle_t *handle_ptr);
00087 
00088 extern cvmx_wqe_t *
00089 cvmx_timer_cancel(cvmx_timer_id_t timer_id, cvmx_timer_handle_t *handle_ptr);
00090 
00091 extern uint64_t
00092 cvmx_timer_current_tick(cvmx_timer_id_t timer_id);
00093 
00094 extern uint64_t
00095 cvmx_timer_maximum_tmo(cvmx_timer_id_t timer_id);
00096 
00097 extern uint64_t
00098 cvmx_timer_ns_to_tick(cvmx_timer_id_t timer_id, uint64_t ns);
00099 
00100 extern uint64_t
00101 cvmx_timer_tick_to_ns(cvmx_timer_id_t timer_id, uint64_t ticks);
00102 
00103 extern cvmx_timer_id_t
00104 cvmx_timer_create(const char *name, unsigned node, unsigned pool,
00105         uint64_t min_tmo, uint64_t max_tmo);
00106 
00107 extern cvmx_timer_id_t
00108 cvmx_timer_id_from_name(const char *name);
00109 
00110 extern cvmx_timer_status_t
00111 cvmx_timer_destroy(cvmx_timer_id_t timer_id, const char *name);
00112 
00113 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00114 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00115 }
00116 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00117 #endif

00119 #endif  /* __CVMX_TIM_ATOMIC_H */
